action.action-desc: Mr. Inhofe (for himself and Mr. King) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide flexibility to school food authorities in establishing a price for paid school lunches.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the School Lunch Price Protection Act of 2015.
Section 12(p) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1760(p)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking subparagraph (A) and inserting the following:

For each school year beginning on or after July 1, 2015, each school food authority that had a negative balance of funds in the nonprofit school food service account of the school food authority for the previous school year shall establish a price for paid lunches in accordance with this subsection.
in subparagraph (B)(i), by inserting described in subparagraph (A) after authority; and
in subparagraph (C)(i), by inserting described in subparagraph (A) after authority; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (3)(A), by inserting described in paragraph (2)(A) after authority.
